thread.title: Pirates top Cardinals 8-2 in doubleheader opener
thread.title_full: Pirates top Cardinals 8-2 in doubleheader opener

title: Pirates top Cardinals 8-2 in doubleheader opener
text:
> Top News Pirates top Cardinals 8-2 in doubleheader opener Pittsburgh Pirates' Francisco Cervelli, center, scores behind St. Louis Cardinals catcher Tony Cruz on a single by Pirates' Jordy Mercer off St. Louis Cardinals relief pitcher Miguel Socolovich in the sixth inning of a baseball game in Pittsburgh, Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015. The Pirates won 8-2. (AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
